Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0

Game information:

Endless Legend - 4X-strategy from the creators of Endless Space.
Struggle for power on the planet Auriga will be 8 civilizations.
The players have to gather "dust" and other resources, to trade,
to develop science and magic artifacts and seek to equip their
characters assimilate small nations. If it comes to war, the
battles have to take into account the influence of the relief
and the ability of different units. On the global map will
change the seasons, and the winters are severe, in the spirit
of "Game of Thrones". Play will allow either alone or in multiplayer.
The project continues the story of the world's Endless, developing
after the events of Endless Space and Dungeon of the Endless.


Repack Features:

Endless Legend
Do not cut / recoded


Additions:

Founder Pack
